app_id.title: App ID
app_id.description: Unique app identifier generated by AppsFlyer at installation.

api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: AppsFlyer API Token. If you change the account admin, the token changes, and you must update scripts with the new token. Get the API token in the Dashboard.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Any data before this date will not be replicated. Raw Reports historical lookback is limited to 90 days.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Time zone in which date times are stored. The project timezone may be found in the App settings in the AppsFlyer console.
